sqlMap.update: insert into huiyuanjifen (huiyuanmingcheng,huiyuanjifen,operatorId,itime,detail) values(#huiyuanmingcheng#,#huiyuanjifen#,#operatorId#,(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S ') from dual),#detail#)
update huiyuanjifen set huiyuanmingcheng=#huiyuanmingcheng#,huiyuanjifen=#huiyuanjifen#, itime=(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S ') from dual),detail=#detail# where id=#id#

update huiyuanjifen set huiyuanjifen=huiyuanjifen+#jifen#, itime=(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S ') from dual) where huiyuanmingcheng=(select huiyuanmingcheng from huiyuanxinxi where huiyuanbianhao=#huiyuanbianhao# and deleteFlag=0)

update huiyuanjifen set huiyuanjifen=huiyuanjifen-#jifen#, itime=(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S ') from dual) where huiyuanmingcheng=(select huiyuanmingcheng from huiyuanxinxi where huiyuanbianhao=#huiyuanbianhao# and deleteFlag=0) and (huiyuanjifen+0) > (#jifen#+0)
update huiyuanjifen set deleteFlag=#deleteFlag# where id in ( $id$ )
update huiyuanjifen set zhuangtai=#zhuangtai# where id in ( $id$ )
